name: @triplett/stew
description: A stateful virtual DOM for any purpose.
author: triplett

scripts.build: rimraf dist && esbuild src/main.js --outfile=dist/stew.min.js --bundle --minify --banner:js=//@triplett/stew@v3.2.1 --legal-comments=linked && esbuild src/module.js --outfile=dist/stew.min.mjs --format=esm --bundle --minify --banner:js=//@triplett/stew@v3.2.1 --legal-comments=linked
